item.title: Certified Kubernetes Application Developer (CKAD) Exam Tips
item.description: Prep The first, and most important thing you can do, is understand the platform. If you have never used Kubernetes for any significant period of time, this guide will not help you. I waited until after I had 5+ years of experience before finally deciding to go ahead and grab these certifications. I was able to take the exam, triple check my work, and not feel rushed. However, I only had about 10 minutes to spare at the end.
